00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Collections.Generic;
00025 using System.Text;
00026 using System.Xml;
00027 #endregion
00028 
00029 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.APMLHelper
00030 {
00034     public class Applications
00035     {
00036         #region Constructors
00037 
00038 
00039 
00040         public Applications()
00041         {
00042         }
00043 
00048         public Applications(XmlElement Element)
00049         {
00050             if (Element.Name.Equals("applications", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00051             {
00052                 foreach (XmlNode Child in Element.ChildNodes)
00053                 {
00054                     try
00055                     {
00056                         if (Child.Name.Equals("application", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00057                         {
00058                             Application.Add(new Application((XmlElement)Child));
00059                         }
00060                     }
00061                     catch { }
00062                 }
00063             }
00064         }
00065         #endregion
00066 
00067         #region Properties
00068 
00069 
00070 
00071         public List<Application> Application
00072         {
00073             get { return _Application; }
00074             set { _Application = value; }
00075         }
00076         private List<Application> _Application = new List<Application>();
00077         #endregion
00078 
00079         #region Overridden Functions
00080         public override string ToString()
00081         {
00082             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00083             Builder.Append("<Applications>");
00084             foreach (Application App in Application)
00085             {
00086                 Builder.Append(App.ToString());
00087             }
00088             Builder.Append("</Applications>");
00089             return Builder.ToString();
00090         }
00091         #endregion
00092     }
00093 }
